meanings.definition: A Mexican dish made with a tortilla rolled around a filling, typically of meat and beans, covered with a chili sauce.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious enchilada for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant serves the best enchiladas in town.
meanings.sent3: When the enchilada fell off the plate, it tried to roll away!
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a messy enchilada, filled with unexpected twists.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling enchilada filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: Dealing with that problem was a real enchilada.
meanings.sent2: She found herself in quite an enchilada at work.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle the cords was like solving an enchilada puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The political situation was a spicy enchilada no one wanted to taste.
meanings.sent5: Navigating through the crowded market was an enchilada of challenges.
